security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only workflow documentation and git command instructions. No executable code, no network calls defined directly, no filesystem access beyond standard git operations. Safe for publishing.

content.user_title: Create GitHub pull requests in Japanese
content.value_statement: Creating GitHub pull requests requires following multiple steps correctly. This skill automates the complete PR workflow including commit, push, and PR creation with proper validation checks. All interactions happen in Japanese.
actual_capabilities: Check git status and diff before committing
Stage and commit changes with proper format
Create GitHub pull request using gh CLI
limitations: Japanese language only for user communication
Requires gh CLI installed for PR creation
Cannot create PRs without proper git repository setup

use_cases.title: Japanese workflow
use_cases.description: Automate PR creation with Japanese prompts and responses

use_cases.title: Standardized PRs
use_cases.description: Ensure consistent PR creation with validation checks

use_cases.title: Branch workflow
use_cases.description: Streamline branch commits and push to origin

best_practices: Always review git diff before staging files explicitly
Run tests and checks before committing changes
Follow existing commit message style from git log
anti_patterns: Using git add . or git add -A for staging

faq.question: What languages does this skill support?
faq.answer: This skill communicates in Japanese only. All prompts and responses are in Japanese.

faq.question: What tools are required?
faq.answer: Git and GitHub CLI (gh) must be installed. The skill uses these to execute operations.

faq.question: Can I use this without git repository?
faq.answer: No. This skill requires a valid git repository with remote origin configured on GitHub.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only reads git status and creates commits. No data is sent to external servers.

faq.question: What if git commands fail?
faq.answer: The skill provides Japanese error explanations and suggestions to resolve issues before continuing.

faq.question: How is this different from manual PR creation?
faq.answer: This skill adds validation checks, follows project requirements from CLAUDE.md, and ensures proper commit message formatting.
